query: SELECT c/uid/value AS Composition_ID, v/commit_audit/time_committed/value, c/archetype_details/template_id/value AS TemplateID, e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value AS SubjectID, c/context/start_time/value AS Berichtsdatum, c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value AS BerichtID, c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.case_identification.v0]/items[at0001]/value/value AS Fall_Kennung, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.problem_qualifier.v2]/items[at0063]/value/value AS Kategorie_der_Diagnose, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.problem_qualifier.v2]/items[at0063]/value/defining_code/code_string AS Kategorie_der_Diagnose_Code, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0069]/value/value AS Diagnose_type, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.problem_qualifier.v2]/items[at0004]/value AS DiagnosticStatus, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0069,'Diagnoseerläuterung']/value AS PrimärcodeDiagnoseerläuterung, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0002,'Kodierte Diagnose']/value/value AS Kodierte_Diagnose, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/defining_code/code_string AS Kodierte_Diagnose_code_string, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/defining_code/terminology_id/value AS Kodierte_Diagnose_terminology_id, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/value/value AS Feststellungsdatum, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0012]/value/value AS Seitenlokalisation_Value, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0012]/value/defining_code/terminology_id/value AS Seitenlokalisation_terminology_id, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0012]/value/defining_code/code_string AS Seitenlokalisation_code_string, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/value/value AS Schweregrad, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/value/defining_code/code_string AS Schweregrad_Code, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/value/defining_code/terminology_id/value AS Schweregrad_terminology_id, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.problem_qualifier.v1]/items[at0003]/value/value AS Klinischer_status, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0073,'Diagnosesicherheit']/value/value as PrimärcodeDiagnosesicherheit, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0073,'Diagnosesicherheit']/value/defining_code/code_string as PrimärcodeDiagnosesicherheit_Code, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Primärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0073,'Diagnosesicherheit']/value/defining_code/terminology_id/value as PrimärcodeDiagnosesicherheit_terminology_id, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Sekundärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0002,'Kodierte Diagnose']/value/value AS SekondaryDiagnosis_CodeString, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Sekundärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0002,'Kodierte Diagnose']/value/defining_code/code_string AS SekondaryDiagnosis_Display, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Sekundärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/value/value AS SecondaryDiagnosis_Time, c/content[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1,'Sekundärcode']/data[at0001]/items[at0073,'Diagnosesicherheit']/value AS SecondaryDiagnosesicherheit FROM EHR e CONTAINS VERSION v CONTAINS COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report.v1] CONTAINS EVALUATION x[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1] WHERE c/name/value='Diagnose' AND v/commit_audit/time_committed/value >= '{{last_run_time}}' LIMIT 10
